result.value: Variant Interpretation using Biomedical literature Evidence

Here, each row represents a gene. Each row consists out of several (tab-seperated) fields. First is the NCBI gene id, then the highest found gene-disease association score found in DisGeNET for that gene, and finally all found associated diseases with the gene-disease association score specific for that gene-disease combination followed by the evidence IDs (pubmed if no URL is shown) for it. 
The `-u` option changes the output to use URI's instead of ID's for certain fields. As this strongly increases the output size, in general it is not advised to use this option.

- The different modules partly use the same resources. To not create duplicate data, these are stored in the `shared_resources/shared` folder. When adding new test resources to a module, ensure that there is no `src/test/resources/shared` directory.
- In case tests fail on Jenkins due to Jenkins-specific reasons (f.e. due to requiring to change a file permission of a test resource), the JUnit tag `skipOnJenkins` can be used so that these test still occur when building locally.

* Download [vibe .jar file][vibe_download]
* Download and extract [HDT][hdt_download] ([sha256 checksum](./database/checksums/database.sha256))
* Download the [HPO.owl][hpo_owl]
* Make sure you have [Java 8 or higher][java_download]
* Open a terminal and run VIBE. `java -jar vibe-with-dependencies-<version>.jar -d -t vibe-<db-version>.hdt -o results.tsv -p HP:0002996 -p HP:0001377`

Below are the instructions on how to build the app. For instructions on how to create the HDT, please check [here](./database/README.md).  
### Requirements
- Apache Maven ([download][maven_download] and [install][maven_install])

Before building/testing, be sure the needed test resources are downloaded. This can be done by running `TestsPreprocessor.sh`. When checking out a commit that uses a different version of the test resources (as defined by the `pom.xml` properties `vibe-database.version` and `hpo-owl.tag`), be sure to re-run this script so that the correct resources are used for testing.

1. Run `mvn clean install` to create all needed files.
   - An überjar for the command-line tool can be found at `vibe-cli/target/vibe-with-dependencies-<version>.jar` .
   - Checksums are available in the `<sub-module>/target/checksums/` folders for the following formats:
     - MD5
     - SHA-256
     - SHA-512
     - SHA3-512

- release -> release branches (f.e. `release/5.0`)
- feature -> a branch for a new feature (f.e. `feature/hdt`)
- fix -> implementing a fix (f.e. `fix/invalid_hgnc`)
- chore -> simple maintenance tasks (f.e. `chore/readme_update`)
- backmerge -> merging back fixes on release branches back to master (f.e. `backmerge/5.0`)

* Download [vibe .jar file][vibe_download]
* Download and extract [HDT][hdt_download] ([sha256 checksum](./database/checksums/database.sha256))
* Download the [HPO.owl][hpo_owl]
* Make sure you have [Java 8 or higher][java_download]
* Open a terminal and run VIBE. `java -jar vibe-with-dependencies-<version>.jar -d -t vibe-<db-version>.hdt -o results.tsv -p HP:0002996 -p HP:0001377`

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Version-bump. by @svandenhoek in https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/pull/88
* Feature/travis ci by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/pull/89
* Use Travis for CI instead of Jenkins by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/pull/90
* Bump gson 2.8.6 to 2.8.9 (fixes a reported security vulnerability) by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/pull/93
* chore:bump version 5.3.0-SNAPSHOT to 5.3.0 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/pull/94


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/compare/vibe-5.2.0...v5.3.0
result.name: v5.3.0

result.description:
## Added
- JSON (de)serialization through streaming functionality for GeneDiseaseCollection

## Changed
- GeneDiseaseCollection JSON (de)serialization code moved to its own package

## Deprecated
- old code for in-memory GeneDiseaseCollection JSON (de)serialization

## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|ec5d98e01def62c630f36fb64464a22e|
|SHA-256|3065f08b9f4af2d399b916a780a5c53aba85dc7074d1f7890fd0767cba1cb1b3|
|SHA-512|1d43689a93efaf1a6ecb2282b004b10daec1c8afb2cda74d1511c49d86b78c1749fcd3ab57b99e442349dcfa2cf7f445482ae2489b5fae74088313033212e3ed|
|SHA3-512|98e57565b8b894952046e3922ba599ef779fbdd72e500fa475764b1f1673f95a41faab0aadba239d282ab10ce7a5cf299b85edfbf102af54fc9f300e6ee51d95|

## Features
- Updated to new database version:
  - DisGeNET: v6.0.0 → v7.0.0 (also still includes some data from v5.0.0)
  - Orphadata HOOM: 1.3 → 1.5
  - Semanticscience Integrated Ontology: 1.43 → 1.51

## Bugfixes
- Fixed error messages not always showing fully.

## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|2283297a6e9f65f98d66dce744b00478|
|SHA-512|9d901354a6b7a9fbb49bf342a3ffeef783f355796ba67186c928b648d3302790cf4c06302037f88423ffc84b8e1a387566279f15b1435cbe77388174f24ac0df|
|SHA3-512|96a6e42f5924846ea0c38015143983fa937f8be69c4021751c10c3fb888e59fc9f514941e298b3b94502a5fb5f172cb9f9d36dcbbfda079dc315b844637297b7|

## Bugfixes
- Fixed a bug causing an error when using the simple output-format and no results were found.


## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|058467662a621f6757d991b9da820c86|
|SHA-512|3431ff69a9e854796c788bf06756b278d4d72e340511ae2e93a612542f4dac803b6caf3e00f65f9e6c41af2d1feda3a20626fce03311b854e2503f88ca5fb22d|
|SHA3-512|981b6132116b8f04ddeda092a5d28c772c21a3e1352bd1d0baa82078b4ab65673f35fa13cebe1db7afac11941c09964b830eaf676a64342c06761cf5efc5b5a5|

## Features
- Switched from TDB to HDT as main database storage format
    - #59 Allow concurrent usage of database among separate JVMs
    - #69 Allow database to be used from a read-only partition
    - Database now requires less storage size while maintaining similar performance
- Updated documentation


## Bugfixes
- Implemented workaround where within `BiologicalEntityCollection` a different `combinationsMap` would generate the same hashCode


## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|6faaed18e1527cc29dbd42b7ad9dfc92|
|SHA-512|4cc5a6f3d9c2cc2473579d4ea0e3094fc7c2bc3c97b9a0575a39c525c4372b5498dab8e494068b2e32045a5f5694256bf7a945be844b07b45f03a436a7dff7e7|
|SHA3-512|fc2e01ce331e125d2086e3588717ffe8aeb6b8dcfe2790891c30e90cfe3f6b17606868f45fe0ac62361e75acacaabb4b241603a001ef1e681baaeb044a981c93|

## Features
- Vibe split up into submodules: `vibe-core` & `vibe-cli`
- Added wrapper classes which should make it easier to use `vibe-core` (see [this](https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/wiki/Using-vibe-core) wiki page)
- Changed some command-line arguments for better consistency among the different Molgenis command-line tools


## Bugfixes
- Fixed many SonarCloud code smells
- General code improvements & bug fixes


## Known issues
- #25 Automatically include alternative HPO id's (note that the created wrapper `PhenotypesRetrievalRunner` is also effected by this)
- Docker support currently removed (see [this](https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/pull/45) pull request for more information)


## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|25ce4b88d15ff99782d1d35fa7f9bd6e|
|SHA-512|4637b8bc5803a4ccdcff046f5c881851ac9829598ef7a1d7ea566fedc9a2da6ff0365bfa01462ff4d53f835b64b1e607336ab03dcbf980463db535f3bd01f2b8|
|SHA3-512|56077fc794a9741bd77dfa525a4884242aabb999fd2d069126cc4d8184e7a03cdd787605ca5baf8936ca5e0fc8d807fcd25537509697dbe0f377e4df16a80a98|

## Features
- Pubmed IDs ordered by release year (newest first).
- New TDB release (**be sure to update the TDB to the [new release](https://molgenis.org/downloads/vibe/vibe-3.1.0-tdb.tar.gz)!**).

## Bugfixes
- Fixed a bug that resulted in Jenkins (continues integration) to fail.

## Known issues
- #40 Jenkins release step not fully operational

## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|05a06eeef1646d0cbe67f9ffe0a54d6c|
|SHA-512|b518435cf82b9a11e05bb28442d3957de4010a96027a90e78309a1c4afe36e61b6cb86e73a8e03fbe4dfb722f8003a816958e8e89d79c158004fb330fc7b4196|
|SHA3-512|85da692ff674848e3421b4edfc931e6786c1d436b6b19f3e06fa05d05062f90662e0ddbc507a7242d7bef9dfb2ffdf95e2bac19107a7d70483a2ae07fb75f948|

## Features
- Output can now be written to stdout instead of a file (simply exclude `-o` argument)
- Gene symbols are included again in the output (instead of only ncbi gene id's)
- Using `-u` shows the complete RDF uri's in the output (increases file size by a lot though!)
- Integrated Jenkins
- Added [SonarCloud](https://sonarcloud.io/dashboard?id=org.molgenis%3Avibe) validation
- [Docker](https://hub.docker.com/r/molgenis/vibe) image made available
- Added script for automated TDB creation
- Updated TDB with v1.3 of Orphadata's HOOM
- Verbose time now shows time per section instead of total time

## Bugfixes
- #22 Sonar gives 0% code coverage
- #18 TestNGPreprocessing fails on windows
- Additional fixes caught by complete overhaul of tests

## Known issues
- #40 Jenkins release step not fully operational

## Checksums
|Algorithm|checksum|
|---|---|
|MD5|6796b404b6c0d3a906d444052b5a7d48|
|SHA-512|da965875fd019ff509306436e4d7f31d1a3aa7d5faa66aaefc5dc75133b40b088487c29af31b46b34705b84522f46804c43ddb3c4fcefac3637bf4b93da82be0|
|SHA3-512|162bebc50c3fa9b10d5d2d095accaf421b446a5f666b2b5c46bd9db6332d167f0aa22e42b8eb83cf240945caac33ced93d7b674b1718fe4ef4e0a6d15f09e549|

## Features
- Reduced needed runtime/database size through usage of [custom TDB](https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/blob/efb7b727e75753bcd3ddb1ee937c8fe0fcb5ff2e/database/README.md)
- Included [Orphadata HOOM](http://www.orphadata.org/cgi-bin/index.php#ontologies) phenotype-disease annotations
- Upgraded to DisGeNET v6.0.0 (combined with phenotype-disease annotations from v5.0.0).
- Filtered gene-disease associations found for a gene to those where a disease is directly matched with an input phenotype
- Updated tool dependencies to more recent versions
- Adjusted (non-simplified) output format
- Overhauled package structure
- Removed DSI & DPI ranking/output in favor of better performance (as these rankings seemed inferior anyway)


## Bugfixes
- #10 Build failure using Java v11
- Maven build warnings

result.value:
* [Java 8 or higher][java_download]
* [A local HDT dataset][hdt_download]
* [Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)][hpo_owl]

`java -jar vibe-with-dependencies.jar [-h] [-v] [-d] [-f] -t <FILE> -w <FILE> [-n <NAME> -m <NUMBER>] [-o <FILE>] [-l] [-u] -p <HPO ID> [-p <HPO ID>]...`

**IMPORTANT:** Do keep  [this](https://github.com/molgenis/vibe/issues/25) in mind. Especially when using `-n`.

Using only the user-defined phenotypes:

`java -jar vibe-with-dependencies-<version>.jar -d -t vibe-<db-version>.hdt -w hp.owl -o results.tsv -p HP:0002996 -p HP:0001377`

---

Using the user-defined phenotypes and phenotypes that are related to them with a maximum distance of 1:

`java -jar vibe-with-dependencies-<version>.jar -d -t vibe-<db-version>.hdt -w hp.owl -n distance -m 1 -o results.tsv -p HP:0002996`

---

Using the user-defined phenotypes and their (grand)children with a maximum distance of 2:

`java -jar vibe-with-dependencies-<version>.jar -d -t vibe-<db-version>.hdt -w hp.owl -n children -m 2 -o results.tsv -p HP:0002996`
